title: Cognitive Fatigue Management and Immersion Enhancement Strategies in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and online learning experience
context.additional_context: A program to mitigate cognitive fatigue and enhance learning immersion through self-directed learning strategies in a smartphone-centric restricted technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can implement three time-management strategies to reduce cognitive load in smartphone environments within one week.
Learners can create a self-directed learning plan and achieve an 80%+ implementation rate according to daily learning goals.
Learners can recognize moments of declining concentration during online learning and apply three re-engagement techniques (breath control, mini-stretching, visual focus shifting).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
